statements: DELETE FROM RenewableEnergySources WHERE id = 5 AND region = 'Europe';
DELETE FROM RenewableEnergySources WHERE technology_type = 'Solar' AND adoption_rate > 0.8;
DELETE FROM EnergyAdoption WHERE region = 'Asia' AND adoption_rate <= 0.5
DELETE FROM adoption_tracking WHERE date = '2022-01-01' AND region_id = 1;
DELETE FROM clean_energy_technologies WHERE tech_id = 5 OR tech_name = 'Solar Panel';
DELETE FROM RenewableEnergySources WHERE source_name = 'Solar Panels';
DELETE FROM RenewableEnergySources WHERE region='Europe' AND installation_date < '2020-01-01';
DELETE FROM GovernmentIncentives WHERE start_date < '2019-06-01' AND end_date > '2021-12-31';
